data.text:
@luongphucnguyen @Gab_H_R Update: very sad (and keep going up)😣

HK recorded over 50k cases today, which translates to over 2M cases population adjusted in the US.  Both have seriously under-tested and under-reported! https://t.co/r01BzMIKGH
@Gab_H_R Hong Kong covid deaths 98/1M pop'n; Canada 956/1M; U.K. 2356/1M; U. S. 2918/1M All tragic

@a__virologist @Gab_H_R Thankyou.  Hadn’t seen this organisation. 

Variants are being swept under the carpet lately.  Too much going on.  Governments will act surprised when we’re all in Denmark/Hong Kong territory.

@Michele_PhD_ @luongphucnguyen @Gab_H_R The whole world has it, we just haven't found it and the other endless number of variants that escape vaccination and we are selecting all around the world... Remember BA.1? When it was found in SA, it had already been in Europe for weeks

@KaiSchreiben @Gab_H_R @luongphucnguyen there isn't "they didn't report" in many countries of East Asia.. they know how serious the disease is... The countries there with low covid rates really have it, numbers raising after Omicron
@luongphucnguyen @Gab_H_R Denmark went from 3 to 30 in a week, even with VERY subnotificated numbers...
@DrWilliamKu @Gab_H_R It's not just a vaccination issue. That's so simplistic.
